statements: DELETE FROM customer_transactions WHERE customer_id = 2002 AND amount > 1000;

DELETE FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'refund' AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM withdrawals WHERE customer_id = 2002 AND amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM accounts WHERE customer_id = 5 AND balance < -500.00;
